#{tid}
SELECT relation_id AS relationId, team_id AS teamId, driver_id AS driverId FROM car_relate_team WHERE 1=1 AND team_id in (#{teamIds})

SELECT t.relation_id AS relationId, t.team_id AS teamId, t.driver_id AS driverId, t1.team_name teamName FROM car_relate_team t,car_driver_team t1 WHERE t.team_id = t1.id and t.driver_id IN
#{tid}
